metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The read throughput of the network interface on the device in the reporting period for all volumes in the gateway.
metricSpecifications.name: NICReadThroughput

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The write throughput of the network interface on the device in the reporting period for all volumes in the gateway.
metricSpecifications.name: NICWriteThroughput

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The download throughput to Azure from a share during the reporting period.
metricSpecifications.name: CloudReadThroughputPerShare

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The upload throughput to Azure from a share during the reporting period.
metricSpecifications.name: CloudUploadThroughputPerShare

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The total number of bytes that is uploaded to Azure from a share during the reporting period.
metricSpecifications.name: BytesUploadedToCloudPerShare

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The total capacity of the device in bytes during the reporting period.
metricSpecifications.name: TotalCapacity

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The available capacity in bytes during the reporting period.
metricSpecifications.name: AvailableCapacity

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The cloud upload throughput  to Azure during the reporting period.
metricSpecifications.name: CloudUploadThroughput

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The cloud download throughput to Azure during the reporting period.
metricSpecifications.name: CloudReadThroughput

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The total number of bytes that is uploaded to Azure from a device during the reporting period.
metricSpecifications.name: BytesUploadedToCloud
